dc_title_s: Mappe monde ou description du globe terrestre: assujettie aux observations astronomiques; par le Sr. Janvier geographe.
dc_description_s: Map 1 from vol. 1 of Atlas Universel by P. Santini. Relief shown pictorially. Shows the routes of several explorers. 1 map; 47 x 66 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
